      • isOutputCompatible

        public boolean isOutputCompatible(DataType dtOut)
        Description copied from class: NodeInput
        Test only the data type here. This should be overridden in subclasses. It returns false here.
        Overrides:
        isOutputCompatible in class NodeInput
        Parameters:
        dtOut - DataType DataType of output
        Returns:
        boolean true if Output and Input data types are compatible, false otherwise.
